Custom exceptions that are thrown.

CardRegisterExceptions.AlmostSameCardExistsException - Exception in cardregister
Thrown when there already exists a card whose content is almost the same as this card's.
CardRegisterExceptions.AlmostSameCardExistsException(String[][]) - Constructor for exception cardregister.CardRegisterExceptions.AlmostSameCardExistsException
This exception contains the data of the cards that are almost the same as the one being created.
CardRegisterExceptions.CardAlreadyExistsException - Exception in cardregister
This is thrown when there already is a card sufficiently similar to prevent the addition of another.
CardRegisterExceptions.CardAlreadyExistsException(String[]) - Constructor for exception cardregister.CardRegisterExceptions.CardAlreadyExistsException
The constructor is given data of the already existing similar card.
CardRegisterExceptions.NullInputException - Exception in cardregister
Thrown when a card is tried to be created with an empty content.
